archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.5c: c) characteristics of individuals associated with the target environment (e.g. number and types of users, level of access to information, attitude to handling information and adherence to security controls)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
